scripts.dev:safe: taskkill /F /IM node.exe /T && timeout /t 2 /nobreak >nul && npm run wb:build && http-server -p 8080 -o /index.html
scripts.dev: npm run nuke && npm run wb:build && concurrently "npm run wb:build:watch" "http-server -p 8080 -o /index.html"
scripts.wb:dev: npm run kill-port && npm run wb:build && concurrently "npm run wb:build:watch" "npm run wb:serve"
scripts.build: npm run wb:build && npm run serve:root
scripts.wb:setup: npm run wb:install && npm run wb:build
scripts.build:socket: npx tsc websocket-server-manager.ts start-websocket-server.ts claude-websocket-server.ts --esModuleInterop --resolveJsonModule --target ES2020 --module ESNext --moduleResolution Node
scripts.claude:build: npx tsc claude-socket-server.ts --esModuleInterop --resolveJsonModule --target ES2020 --module ESNext --moduleResolution Node
scripts.claude:server: npm run kill-port && npm run claude:build && node claude-socket-server.js
scripts.claude:test: npm run kill-port && npm run claude:build && node claude-socket-server.js
scripts.unified:build: npx tsc unified-claude-websocket-server.ts --esModuleInterop --resolveJsonModule --target ES2020 --module ESNext --moduleResolution Node
scripts.unified:server: npm run kill-port && npm run unified:build && node unified-claude-websocket-server.js
